mapper.sql: id, fee_no, reference, expressnum, order_no, reason_id, reason, reason_detail, customer_id, customer_name, carrier_id, carrier_name, deliver_id, deliver_name, warehouse_id, warehouse_name, create_person, create_person_name, remark, ispay, create_time, pay_money, is_conflict, bill_no, is_calculated, operate_time,is_delivery_free,delivery_cost

if.test: (startTime != null and startTime !='') and (endTime != null and endTime !='')

mapper.select: SELECT SUM(abn.pay_money) as totalPay from fees_abnormal abn where 1=1
mapper.insert: insert into fees_abnormal(fee_no, reference, expressnum, order_no, reason_id, reason, reason_detail, customer_id, customer_name, carrier_id, carrier_name, deliver_id, deliver_name, warehouse_id, warehouse_name, create_person, create_person_name, remark, ispay, create_time, pay_money, is_conflict, bill_no, is_calculated, operate_time) values ( #{feeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expressnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reasonId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reasonDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ispay,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isConflict,jdbcType=BIT}, #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isCalculated,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: select reason_id as reasonId, bill_no as billNo, reason, sum(pay_money+delivery_cost) as amount from fees_abnormal where 1=1 and bill_no=#{billNo} group by reason_id,bill_no,reason

select reason_id as reasonId, bill_no as billNo, reason, sum(pay_money+delivery_cost) as amount ,deliver_id as deliveryid,deliver_name as deliveryName from fees_abnormal where 1=1 and bill_no=#{billNo} and deliver_id=#{deliverid} group by reason_id,bill_no,reason,deliver_id,deliver_name

select id,fee_no,reference,expressnum,order_no,reason,reason_detail, carrier_id,carrier_name,deliver_id,deliver_name,customer_id,customer_name, warehouse_id, warehouse_name,bill_no,create_person,create_person_name,create_time,operate_time, case ispay when '0' then '否' when '1' then '是' end as ispayStr, (case when reason_id=4 then pay_money else -pay_money end) pay_money, case is_calculated when '0' then '未计算' when '1' then '已计算' end as is_calculated, case is_conflict when '0' then '否' when '1' then '是' end as isConflictStr,remark from fees_abnormal where 1=1 and bill_no=#{billNo}

select id,fee_no,reference,expressnum,order_no,reason,reason_detail, carrier_id,carrier_name,deliver_id,deliver_name,customer_id,customer_name, warehouse_id, warehouse_name,bill_no,create_person,create_person_name,create_time,operate_time, case ispay when '0' then '否' when '1' then '是' end as ispayStr, pay_money, is_delivery_free, delivery_cost, case is_calculated when '0' then '未计算' when '1' then '已计算' end as is_calculated, case is_conflict when '0' then '否' when '1' then '是' end as isConflictStr,remark from fees_abnormal where 1=1 and bill_no=#{billNo} and deliver_id=#{deliverid}

select id,fee_no,reference,expressnum,order_no,reason,reason_detail, carrier_id,carrier_name,deliver_id,deliver_name,customer_id,customer_name, warehouse_id, warehouse_name,bill_no,create_person,create_person_name,create_time,operate_time, case ispay when '0' then '否' when '1' then '是' end as ispayStr, ifnull(pay_money+delivery_cost,0) as pay_money, case is_calculated when '0' then '未计算' when '1' then '已计算' end as is_calculated, case is_conflict when '0' then '否' when '1' then '是' end as isConflictStr,remark, is_delivery_free, ifnull(delivery_cost,0) as delivery_cost from fees_abnormal where 1=1 and bill_no=#{billNo} and deliver_id in
#{item}
mapper.update:
update fees_abnormal
bill_no=#{billNo}, is_calculated = #{isCalculated},
where fee_no=#{feeNo} and ifnull(bill_no,'')=''
update fees_abnormal set is_calculated=#{status} where bill_no=#{billNo}
mapper.select: select bill_no as billNo, warehouse_id as warehouseCode, count(0) as num from fees_abnormal where 1=1 and bill_no=#{billNo} and reason_id in('3', '56') group by bill_no, warehouse_id

select bill_no as billNo, warehouse_id as warehouseCode, sum(pay_money) as totalAmount,count(0) as num from fees_abnormal where 1=1 and bill_no=#{billNo} and reason_id = '2' group by bill_no,warehouse_id

select bill_no as billNo, warehouse_id as warehouseCode, sum(pay_money) as totalAmount,count(0) as num from fees_abnormal where 1=1 and bill_no=#{billNo} and reason_id = '4' group by bill_no,warehouse_id
mapper.update: update fees_abnormal set derate_amount=#{derateAmount} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.warehouse_name,a.operate_time,a.expressnum,a.customer_name,a.reason, (case when a.reason_id=4 then a.pay_money else -a.pay_money end) pay_money, b.amount as delivery_cost, case a.is_delivery_free when '0' then '否' when '1' then '是' end as is_delivery_free, a.create_person_name,a.remark FROM fees_abnormal a left join fees_receive_dispatch b on a.expressnum=b.waybill_no and b.del_flag='0' and b.subject_code<>'de_abnormal_pay' where 1=1 and a.bill_no=#{billNo} and a.reason_id<>4

SELECT warehouse_name, operate_time, expressnum, customer_name, reason, (case when reason_id=4 then pay_money else -pay_money end) pay_money, delivery_cost, case is_delivery_free when '0' then '否' when '1' then '是' end as is_delivery_free, create_person_name,remark FROM fees_abnormal where 1=1 and bill_no=#{billNo} and reason_id=4
